overview: Maurice Sanders has a gift. He's a nipple whisperer. Once he was known as "Magic Sandy". But that was years ago, before Doris, a famous model and Sander's muse, fell ill. Now, after more than a decade, Doris wants to meet Maurice again.
tagline: Maurice Sanders has a gift. He's a nipple whisperer. Once he was known as "Magic Sandy".
title: The Nipple Whisperer
